in_function:
context['alternative_key'] = data['sku']
result=[('product_id',self.pool.get('product.product').extid_to_oeid(cr, uid, external_session, ifield, referential_id))]

if ifield:
    result=[('discount', float(data['price']) != 0 and float(data['qty_ordered']) != 0 and float(100*ifield)/(float(data['price'])*float(data['qty_ordered'])) or 0)]

record_id = self.pool.get('ir.model.data').search(cr, uid, [('model', '=', self._name), ('name', '=', self.prefixed_id(ifield))])
parent_id = False
if record_id:
    parent_rec = self.pool.get('ir.model.data').read(cr,uid,record_id[0],[])
    parent_id=parent_rec.get('res_id',False)
result=[('magento_parent_id',ifield),('parent_id',parent_id)]

out_function:
cat_attr_option = self.pool.get('magerp.product_category_attribute_options').browse(cr, uid, record['default_sort_by'][0], context=context)
result=[('default_sort_by', cat_attr_option.value)]

if record['image']:
    img = base64.decodestring(record['image'])
        img_bin_enc = base64.encodestring(img)
        conn.call('ol_catalog_category_media.create', [record['image_name'], img_bin_enc])
    result = [('image',record['image_name'])]
else:
    result=[]

cat_obj = self.pool.get('product.category')
product = self.browse(cr, uid, record['id'])
categ_ids = [product.categ_id.id] + [categ.id for categ in product.categ_ids]
mag_categ_ids = []
for categ_id in categ_ids:
    mag_categ_id = cat_obj.oeid_to_extid(cr, uid, categ_id, external_referential_id)
    if not mag_categ_id:
        cat_obj.ext_export(cr, uid, [categ_id], [external_referential_id], context=context)
        mag_categ_id = cat_obj.oeid_to_extid(cr, uid, categ_id, external_referential_id)
    mag_categ_ids.append(mag_categ_id)
result=[('category_ids', categ_ids)]

##### OPTION START, with this if the field websites of the product is empty the product is exported on every website

if set(websites_ids) == set(all_oe_websites_ids):
    websites_ids =[]

result=[('websites_ids', [(6,0, websites_ids)])]
